page.title: 07FARMING
page.content: remaining land 40 tonnes of{hay}is cut from 10 acres ,600 tonnes of{potatoes are lifted from 60 acres.Of the of the 300 live stock they rear 140 friesians are milked ,the remainder being young stock.A{Herefordshire bull}is kept for breeding.The cattle are accommodated in 8 livestock sheds. The farms are highly mechanised with their own soil preparation ,feeding and harvesting machinery. In the last twenty years the work force has fallen from 27 to 5 due to{mechanisation.}The{farm {buildings consist of five barns, three {grain stores}and two{silage {pits.
